resources.string:
That night when I saw you
I was about to leave
You were in the corner
Hangin' like a masterpiece
You dancin' with all your best friends
Or maybe you could spend the song with me
" Had a tight t-shirt I could see what's underneath Talkin' over speakers You're leanin' close to me You tuck my hair behind my ear I put my finger through the loop of your jeans "
